titleStmt.title: New verses concerning the Plot, Londons fire, & Godfreys murder given to His Majesties hand, the second of September last, by E.R. : whereto is added the papists attempts upon Justice Arnold, Mr. Thomkins, and lately on Sr. William Waller : which also may be sung to the tune, Stone walls cannot a prison make, &c.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, J. (John)
E. R.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Entries cancelled for R15A and T487 in Wing (2nd ed.).
